text: Andrea Malinconico, Susannah and the Elders, c.1650. Andrea Malinconico (1624 in Naples - 1698) was an Italian painter of the Renaissance period, active near his natal city of Naples. He was a pupil of Massimo Stanzione. ==Notes== ==References== * Category:17th-century Neapolitan people Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Neapolitan painters Category:Italian Renaissance painters Category:17th-century Italian people Category:1624 births Category:1698 deaths
title: Andrea Malinconico
